item.description:
Just a social buy-your-own-dinner at John Harvard's Brew Pub in Harvard Square on the 4th Tuesday of the month.

Though you are responsible for paying for your own meal, there's no minimum; if you want to come and have a glass of water, you are welcome to do so.

Please RSVP for a semi-accurate head count. I will make a reservation for the "MySQL User Group". You don't need to come exactly at 7 pm, John Harvard's is OK with seating incomplete parties, and adding more people later.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the "MySQL User Group" table.
item.name: Boston MySQL *Social* Meetup
